Reading Files.Purpose: Reading files is essential to retrieve data stored in files. Java provides several classes and methods for reading files.

Writing Files.Purpose: Writing files allows you to store data generated by your program in files. Java provides classes and methods for writing to files.

Serialization and Deserialization.Purpose: Serialization is the process of converting an object's state to a byte stream, while deserialization is the process of restoring an object from a byte stream.
